mng: zero, nought, zero sign, fractional, fragmentary, odd (of numbers), (placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one), fraction, (in mathematics) remainder (after division), extra, to wither and fall, to wither

exm.mng: fragmentary, random, bits and pieces, sporadic
to retail, to sell individually or in small quantities
withered, wilted, to wither, to fade, to decay
scattered and fragmentary, scraps, odds and ends
